page.title: 13Pop music.
page.content: Many teenagers of today can be seen carrying round with them personal stereos.Using these they listen to live or taped music from the pop charts which reflects the top selling songs and pop groups. In addition to producing music on record and tape many groups make video tapes to be shown on television whilst the song is played.Most teenagers watch B.B.C. television's programme, "Top of the Pops"to find out the current"Number One"selling record. The records from the charts are played at discos, with flashing lights,where most young people do "break_dancing","robotics" and "body- popping" also, some girls jazzdance. The dancing includes athletic movements which indicate how today's people like to keep fit and healthy.
